data.eml:eml: A new species of Euscorpius Thorell, 1876 (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae) from Turkey

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Tropea, Gioele, Yagmur, Ersen Aydin, Koc, Halil, Yesilyurt, Fatih, Rossi, Andrea (2012): A new species of Euscorpius Thorell, 1876 (Scorpiones, Euscorpiidae) from Turkey. ZooKeys 219: 63-80, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.219.3597, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.219.3597
